post.body: ah! I think I know the one!!! Right in front of me actually! Hehe!
I love it there too!!! :) will say hello as soon as I find the shop! I mean... Where is it hehe?
I'll have to agree!!! Hehehe
hey! I'm keeping my fingers crossed to... and u make sure to tell the tale! ;)
and I'll have to agree 100% with ya... or whoever said it!!! :)
@lulazoid me three...
nope... password... but i've registered already... :)
I want one of those!! :)
my family = more stress! Must avoid prolongued exposure... :)
right... Fair enough... :) I am over my stress limit... Waiting to see where it takes me... Hospital maybe... :)
I would like to point that if you plan to fall asleep I will not be bringing ANY cachaca!! :P
oh... That would be my dream come true!!! Apart from the fact that I would soon get solo very bored! :)
quiet time... Mmmm :)
Yeap I have a gazilion things to do today and yeap I spoil the boy rotten (at ocasions) but I can't bear to make him cry all sad cuz of me!!
Today was non uniform day at tb's school!! And i didn't know!!! Big big big fail!! On my way home to get him a change of clothes!!
Me be late late late, so very late! And outside looks so cold! Wanna go back to bed!!!

First time the builders call me to talk of something non problem related... I'm impressed! Hub looking good!!! :)
why do builders from anywhere in the world have to be such a pain?!?!?!?!
I have another hour just for myself... and I have no idea what to do with it! :( this new me time rule sucks!

I was watching 90210 and that suddenly made me feel so old! The worst bit of it? @glowstars know nothing about the show! I was like... wow!!
wow!!! 3am... off to bed!!! :)

I can't believe I just spent the whole night Reading the last twilight book!!!! 6am... Time to go to sleep! Or is it to wake up??? :)

I wish @glowstars could hurry up so we can leave already...
off to Kathia's partee in 15 min... Texas Embassy... here I go!!! yayyyy!!!
Siting at starbucks Reading and having a vanilla latte! :) been to the hub too! All's awesome there! Hopes up!! :)
I woke up at 12pm today!!! wow wow wow woooooowwww!!! :) hehehehe off to starbucks! :)
